main_definition: To discover or come across something, especially by chance; to establish or set up an organization or group.

meanings_and_examples.example: I found a $20 bill on the ground while walking to work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To establish an organization or group.
meanings_and_examples.example: The nonprofit aimed at helping homeless people was founded in 2015.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To confirm the existence or truth of something.
meanings_and_examples.example: Scientists found evidence supporting the theory of evolution through natural selection.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having been born into a particular situation, condition, or environment; to be part of an existing group or community.
meanings_and_examples.example: He was one of the found members of his family's small business in their hometown.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make something permanent and enduring, such as a building, monument, or organization.
meanings_and_examples.example: The city decided to fund the construction of a new library which would be built with lasting materials.
